author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION COULD BECOME A TROPICAL STORM TODAY BUT STRUGGLES LIKELY LIE AHEAD...
summary:
...DEPRESSION COULD BECOME A TROPICAL STORM TODAY BUT STRUGGLES LIKELY LIE AHEAD...
 As of 5:00 AM AST Fri Sep 13
 the center of Seven was located near 19.0, -38.2
 with movement WNW at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
